"We need to act fast on ASUU, Economy" - VP tells Governors.

  • Achu-ulim Agbama
  • 8/31/2022, 1:05:00 PM
  • Politics

VP Yemi Osinbajo received APC Governors today in his office at the Presidential Villa on a felicitation visit as he recovers from the leg surgery done last month. He reiterated the need to act fact on important national issues especially regarding the economy and the ASUU strike. His Excellency, Engr. Abdullahi A. Sule joined his Colleagues of the Progressives Governors Forum in a meeting with Vice President Yemi Osinbajo SAN in his office at the State House, Abuja on 30th August, 2022.
